projects.title: Celebut Platform
projects.description: Modern social-first platform with secure identity verification
highlights: Designed and developed front-end using Next.js for modern, fast interface
Integrated Sumsub for secure identity verification
Built custom REST APIs and handled complex third-party integrations
Optimized Next.js rendering strategies improving performance scores
Led redesign of user onboarding increasing completion rates by 40%
Implemented responsive design system with Tailwind CSS
challenges: Addressed slow page loads through ISR/SSR optimization
Solved UI inconsistencies across devices
Fixed state management issues in real-time interactions
Introduced API error handling and fallback UI strategies

projects.title: HangoutHub
projects.description: Mobile-first platform for planning, splitting, and celebrating hangouts with friends
highlights: Built full-stack MVP including group creation, expense tracking, and live chat
Designed engaging UI/UX for seamless social interaction
Implemented media sharing and liking functionality with REST APIs
Handled user authentication and session management
challenges: Managed real-time chat performance and message syncing
Resolved inconsistencies in group expense calculations
Optimized API endpoints to reduce latency on mobile devices

projects.title: Buniversity
projects.description: Interactive playground and learning tool for Bun projects
highlights: Visualized project dependencies with a real-time Bun lockfile parser
Built live Bun REPL inside browser using custom server with bun.serve
Created project explorer with dynamic readme preview and routing
Showcased core Bun APIs to help onboard new developers quickly
challenges: Handled dynamic file routing and safe code evaluation in the browser
Ensured Bun version compatibility across features
Optimized visualization performance with large dependency trees

projects.title: Marvick
projects.description: Material-styled mobile app for airtime and data top-up in Nigeria
highlights: Developed mobile app with all major Nigerian telcos supported
Implemented secure wallet system and purchase flow
Built settings, history tracking, and biometric login
Used Firebase for auth and real-time updates
challenges: Managing telco API inconsistencies
Handling real-time balance sync and purchase confirmation
Optimizing for poor network conditions

projects.title: Shophoria
projects.description: Modern eCommerce platform with dynamic product search, filtering, and payments
highlights: Built fully functional shopping experience with cart, checkout, and order history
Integrated Stripe for secure payments
Implemented product CMS integration for easy updates
Used server-side rendering for SEO and fast loading
challenges: Handled currency formatting and region-based pricing
Implemented optimistic UI during checkout
Secured endpoints and payment flows

projects.title: ZenPage
projects.description: Fast-loading marketing landing page app with animations, forms, and A/B testing
highlights: Created smooth animated hero sections and scroll interactions
Integrated A/B testing and analytics tracking
Supported form submissions with Netlify Forms and validation
Optimized bundle size using Vite and tree shaking
challenges: Achieved 90+ Lighthouse score on mobile and desktop
Minimized hydration issues with pre-rendered content
Handled form spam with honeypot + reCAPTCHA

projects.title: AI Voice Chat Assistant
projects.description: Interactive chat assistant with voice input and screen context awareness
highlights: Developed assistant that explains current screen and responds to voice
Used OpenAI for intelligent response generation and memory
Implemented whisper-like transcription for voice input
Integrated smooth UI trigger button with floating interaction bubble
challenges: Balancing fast response time with accurate voice recognition
Handling multi-turn context and fallback UI
Building for both desktop and mobile responsiveness
